content:
# The Stone Furnace currently has 2 units of iron ore and has successfully produced 5 iron plates. 
# It is still working but has not smelted the remaining iron ore because it requires at least 5 units of iron ore to start a new smelting cycle.

# To continue production, I need to insert more iron ore into the furnace. 
# I will insert the remaining 2 units of iron ore from my inventory into the Stone Furnace to ensure it can smelt everything available.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=2)  # Inserting the remaining 2 iron ore into the furnace.
print(f"Inventory after inserting remaining iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking inventory after insertion.
